name: Super Calm Bros. 3
summary:
Super Calm Bros is a light kaizo hack that was inspired by Kamikaze Bros and Riff Bros. The difficulty is geared towards a wide audience and should appeal to both kaizo experts and players looking to level up their skills. The hack features Costumes, Gimmicks, P Speed and Platforming.

There are 6 mandatory worlds with two bonus exits in the final world.
